typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	parameter1 as string
}
source(output(
		PAN as string,
		FIRSTNAME as string,
		SURNAME as string,
		DOB as date,
		GENDER as string,
		UIDNUM as string,
		STATE as string,
		PANGENDT as date,
		LastModifiedtime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> itbadb
source(output(
		PAN as string,
		DATEFILED as date,
		NAME as string,
		UIDNUM as string,
		DOB as date,
		INCOME as float
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> rccdb
itbadb, rccdb join(itbadb@PAN == rccdb@PAN,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		PAN = itbadb@PAN,
		FIRSTNAME,
		SURNAME,
		DOB = itbadb@DOB,
		GENDER,
		UIDNUM = itbadb@UIDNUM,
		STATE,
		PANGENDT,
		LastModifiedtime,
		PAN = rccdb@PAN,
		DATEFILED,
		NAME,
		UIDNUM = rccdb@UIDNUM,
		DOB = rccdb@DOB,
		INCOME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> final
